tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingInstallation (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE RenewableEnergySource (
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  installation_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyGeneration (
  generation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_id INT,
  generation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES RenewableEnergySource(source_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Sensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  installation_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE energy_generation (
    generation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_id INT,
    generation_date DATE,
    generation_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_source_id FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES energy_sources (source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    consumption_date DATE,
    consumption_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
    CONSTRAINT fk_building_id FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES green_buildings (building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuilding (
	building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	building_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	address TEXT,
	city TEXT,
	state TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySource (
	source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	source_type TEXT NOT NULL,
	capacity DECIMAL,
	location TEXT,
	install_date DATE
);
